title: League Client Alpha
body: I'm not sure, however I am almost sure I signed up for the League Client Alpha. I cant comment asking this since I haven't used the LoL boards yet but if someone could help me and tell me if I signed up or not, or if I was rejected by some chance it would be of great help.

replies.body: You did, and if you cannot find your email regarding getting accepted, reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of you.
Also, No I'm not toxic, so that's out of the picture.
